item.title: Predicting AirBnB Prices in Singapore
item.description: Executive Summary In this report we will be analysing data about Airbnb listings in Singapore with the goal of building a model to predict the total cost for two people staying four nights in Singapore. The data is from insideairbnb.com Purpose & Scope: the purpose of this report is to elucidate upon the set deliverable across five facets: Perform a cohesive exploratory data analysis; Chart data in plots and geospatial format to discern trends and select explanatory variables for regression purposes; Conduct a robust regression analysis with selected variables; Diagnose variables demonstrating collinearity, replace said variables to curtail “Variance Inflation Factor”, summarize shortlisted data sets for predictive and informative purposes.
